rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, I hear one of you
was just made a knight.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like I got some pretty
important folks to help me
with my huntin'...

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I guess that's neither here nor there.
By the by, if you're going to the Divine
Beast's core, you're in the wrong place.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0004
rows.name:
First you'll want to get to the Dannagh
Desert. If came from Olnard's Trail,
keep on going via the Braying Canyon.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Once you spot Lake Wynn,
find a wooded path and follow
it to a huge staircase.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0006
rows.name:
I may be poor, but years of
hunting have given me a good lay
of the land around here! Eheh.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0007
rows.name:
You're not like me, though - you've got
more power and more responsibility. I'm
not sure I believe in fate, but...

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, I do believe that you
can defeat the Holy Grail and
help save this country.

rows.label: tlk70000070_05_msg0009
rows.name:
All I want is for my son to have a
future to look forward to. If anyone
can make that happen, it's you.
